about_the_game:
Game Introduction

A mystery adventure game made with RPG Maker VX Ace.

Synopsis

Yamu, an ordinary high school girl, suddenly finds herself chosen as a candidate for the Queen of Ancient Egypt. But earning the throne won’t be easy—she must pass a series of mysterious trials, face unknown entities, and uncover the secrets hidden within this strange world. Surrounded by dangers, with unseen forces testing her every move, Yamu must prove she is worthy. Can she survive the trials and claim her place in history?

Game Features

  • Puzzle & Exploration – Search for clues, solve challenging puzzles, and navigate the unknown.

  • Suspenseful Storytelling – A gripping narrative filled with mystery and unexpected twists.

  • Survival Elements – Stay one step ahead of the mysterious beings lurking in the shadows.

  • Charming Pixel Art – Cute and expressive 2D characters bring the adventure to life.

name: Heir to the Queen

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Microsoft® Windows® XP / Vista / 7 (32-bit/64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel® Pentium® 4 2.0 GHz equivalent or faster processor
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1024 x 768 pixels or higher desktop resolution
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: An ordinary high school girl, Yamu, suddenly finds herself destined to become the Queen of ancient Egypt…
